title: My thanks to you and yours, riot.
body:
With thanksgiving coming up I have been thinking of things for which I am grateful. One of those things is this game. It has given me many (many (many)) hours of fun, and has helped me keep in touch with friends that have moved away/married/gotten busy and so on.

This year especially you are giving us almost everything we wanted; even things we never expected to actually receive. From Baker Pantheon, to replays, to solo queue, the gifts are most welcome and much loved.

Most particularly I thank you for Kalista and rageblade buffs.

I hope you are all enjoying your time this season, and I hope elemental lux is a great hit for you (because though I cannot afford her, she is really beautiful work)

Thanks for the good times rito.


PS: All I want for Christmas is for rework WW to still track low health enemies, as passively as possible!
